content:
Please perform the following actions:

 - Provide a single, 1000 word summary of all sections together. Your summary should be concise and written in such a way that an 18 year old would understand. 
 - Answer the following questions after restating the question...
 - "Could the government take action against civilians under this act?"
 - "What is a 'covered transaction' and what are 5 examples of 'covered transactions" that might involve a civilian directly?"
